attributes.action: Hold a referendum on No deal' Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: The PM said no deal would a failure of statecraft,  a 1 million to 1 chance against, and all the other promises about being the easiest deal to do etc.  Now we know there no deal.  A simple easy to understand vote is possible.  No to 'no-deal' and a return to EU membership.
attributes.background: A 'no deal' is a radical departure from the 'easy deal' promised.  A 'no deal' has deep and enduring economic consequences for the UK and its citizens.  It needs to be voted upon by Parliament and the people of the UK in a referendum.
